projects.name: Graph pangenomics methods development
projects.summary: Developing computational methods to construct and analyze graph-based representations of pangenomes, enabling more accurate modelling of genomic variation across populations and improving downstream analyses like variant calling, functional annotation, and comparative genomics.

projects.name: Structural bioinformatics modelling and protein-protein interaction
projects.summary: Using computational models to predict and analyze protein structures and their interactions, aiding in the understanding of molecular function, binding mechanisms, and potential targets for plant trait development.
